name: Wizardas
description:
■ Overview
It is a game that annihilates the monsters that infest in the graveyard and earns score.

■ Stylish Exhilarating 3D Action Game
You are a "Wizard" who specializes in flame magic.
Using three attack spells, recovery spells and high jump spell, you fly around the map endlessly and fight.

■ 3 Game Modes
In "Limit Fight Mode", kill as many monsters as possible in 3 minutes.
In "Final Fight Mode", you fight until you die.
If you want to practice fighting, you can select the "Training Mode".

■ 5 Levels of Difficulty
You can choose from 5 levels of difficulty.
In order of difficulty level,
- Novice
- Hard
- Veteran
- Master
- Impossible
The higher the difficulty level, the stronger the enemies become, but you can get higher scores.

■ Medals for Expert
Experts who meet the following conditions can obtain a medal.
- Medal of Scarlet: You get 300,000 scores or more points in the "Limit Fight Mode" and difficulty level of "Impossible".
- Medal of Twilight: You get 200,000 scores or more points in the "Final Fight Mode" and difficulty level of "Impossible".

■ Supported Languages
You can change the language from in-game preferences.
- English
- Japanese
